name: Cyber Snail
description:
Cyber Snail is a puzzle skill-based game combining window stretching features with fast paced snail driving action for a unique experience.

Cyber Snail was created during Montreal's Indie Play Space Game Jam 2017 at Dawson College.

Credits

Guillaume Duquesne - Development

Alexandre Pernot Lopes - Development

Pablo Nény - 2D Artist / Level Designer

Léandre Leblanc - 2D Artist / Level Designer

Dany Ayoub - 2D Artist / Animator
